tab1_text: Mapstories was created as part of a cooperation between re:edu GmbH & Co.KG and Vamos e.V.. The starting point of the project was the implementation of a co-creative lab on the global garment industry. Mapstories is a web-based open source tool that the students used to independently design an introduction to development education on the above-mentioned topic. The Mapstories can be used especially in the context of education for sustainable development due to the possibility of vividly creating systemic links and enable a comprehensive view of global issues
tab4_text: You want to show in the digital space where there are places or projects of social cohesion and how they are connected? We offer online training on how to use the platform for different target groups. 90 minutes is all it takes to get to know the platform and its functions and to develop your own ideas for your first story. The costs vary between 100€ and 250€, depending on the context and the effort involved. Enquiries to: mapstories@vamos-muenster.de
